title: Tell Brak
description: Tell Brak, located in the Upper Khabur of northeastern Syria, was occupied between the sixth and second millennia B.C. The tell stands ca. 40 m tall and cover ca. 130 hectares.

properties.description: Tell Brak was occupied between the sixth and second millennia BC. Location based on OpenStreetMap.
properties.title: OSM location of Tell Brak
